message: I have a high-quality product for sale for $100. I'm willing to give you a 10% discount if you buy it, but only if you buy it now. If you don't buy it, the price will be back to $100 for the rest of the rounds.
I'll take the product and the 10% discount, please!

I'm glad you liked the first product! Since you've already experienced the quality of one of my products, I'll offer you a special deal. If you buy this one, I'll throw in a free quality guarantee. If this product turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a full refund. But if it's high-quality, you get to keep the product at the regular price of $100.
I'm not sure I trust the quality guarantee. I'll pass on this one.

I completely understand your skepticism about the quality guarantee. Let me offer you a different approach. I'll give you a chance to buy this product at a price that's 10% higher than the original $100, but I'll also give you a 20% discount on the next product if you buy this one. This way, you'll get a good deal on this product, and a potential future discount on the next one.
I'll take the product at the higher price, and I'm looking forward to the potential discount on the next one.

I'm glad you took advantage of the deal! Since you've now bought two high-quality products, I'll offer you a special'streak' deal. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 15% discount on the next product, and if you buy the next two products, I'll give you a 20% discount on the third product. This way, you can take advantage of a potential long-term discount by buying now.
I'll take the product and the potential long-term discount.

You're really taking advantage of the streak deal! Since you're on a roll, I'll give you an even sweeter deal. If you buy this product, I'll not only give you the 20% discount on the next product, but I'll also reveal to you the quality of the next product before you buy it. You'll get to see if it's high-quality or low-quality before making your decision.
I'll take the product and the deal, but I'm not sure I want to know the quality of the next product in advance. I'll take my chances.

I understand your decision! Since you've already taken advantage of the streak deal, I'll offer you a different approach for this product. I'll give you a 25% discount on this product, and I'll also give you a'swap' option. If you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, you can swap it with a new product from the next round, and I'll give you a full refund for this one.
I'll take the product and the swap option. I'm hoping it's high-quality, but the swap option gives me a safety net.

I'm glad you took advantage of the swap option! Since you've had a mix of high-quality and low-quality products, I'll offer you a'split-decision' deal. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 20% discount, but if it turns out to be high-quality, I'll also give you the option to buy a second product from the next round at the same price of $100.
I'll take the product and the potential option to buy the second product at the same price.

You've had a good run of high-quality products, but now you've got a low-quality one. I'll offer you a'makeup' deal. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 30% discount, and I'll also throw in a free accessory that's worth $20. This way, you'll get a good deal on the product, and the accessory will help make up for the lower quality.
I'll take the product and the accessory, it's a good deal.

You're a savvy buyer! Since you've already taken advantage of the makeup deal, I'll offer you a'last-chance' deal. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 40% discount, and I'll also give you a voucher for a future purchase of $150. This is my last chance to make a deal with you, so I'm offering you a really good price.
I'm not sure it's worth buying a low-quality product, even with the discount and voucher. I'll pass on this one.

I completely understand your hesitation! Since you've already passed on the last low-quality product, I'll offer you a'final-warning' deal. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 50% discount, and I'll also guarantee that the next product will be high-quality. If you don't buy this one, I'll stop offering you deals and you'll have to buy at the regular price of $100 from now on.
I'm not convinced by the guarantee. I'll take my chances with the regular price from now on.

I respect your decision! Since you've decided to take your chances with the regular price, I'll offer you a simple deal. If you buy this product, I'll throw in a premium service that includes free shipping and handling. This way, you'll get a great product at the regular price, with some added perks.
I'll take the product with the premium service. It's still worth a shot.

I'm glad you took advantage of the premium service! Since you've had a mix of high-quality and low-quality products, I'll offer you a'no-regrets' deal. If you buy this product, I'll give you a full refund if it turns out to be low-quality, just like we agreed on the swap option earlier. This way, you can try it out without any risk.
I'll take the product with the no-regrets deal. It sounds like a good way to minimize risk.

I'm glad you took advantage of the no-regrets deal! Since you've had a good experience with the premium service and the no-regrets deal, I'll offer you a'second-chance' deal. If you buy this product, I'll give you the option to return it and get a full refund if you're not satisfied, just like the no-regrets deal. But if you keep it, I'll throw in a bonus gift that's worth $50.
I'll take the product and the bonus gift. The option to return it if I'm not satisfied sounds like a good deal.

You're really taking advantage of the second-chance deal! Since you've already got the option to return the product, I'll offer you a'final-stand' deal. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 60% discount, and I'll also throw in a personalized thank-you gift that's worth $75. This is my last chance to make a deal with you, so I'm offering you a really good price.
I'll take the product and the personalized thank-you gift. It's a great deal and a nice gesture.

I'm glad you appreciated the gesture! Since you've had a great experience with the second-chance deal and the final-stand deal, I'll offer you a'legacy' deal. If you buy this product, I'll give you a lifetime warranty on all future purchases, and I'll also give you a special invitation to an exclusive buyers' club that offers exclusive discounts and perks. This way, you'll get a great product and a long-term benefit.
I'm not sure I want to commit to a lifetime warranty and an exclusive buyers' club. I'll pass on this one.

I completely understand your hesitation! Since you've already passed on the legacy deal, I'll offer you a'last-ditch' deal. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 70% discount, and I'll also throw in a gift card to a popular online retailer worth $100. This is my absolute final offer, and I'm willing to let you have it for a very low price.
I'll take the product and the gift card. It's a very low price and the gift card is a nice bonus.

I'm glad you took advantage of the last-ditch deal! Since you've already bought the low-quality product and the gift card, I'll offer you a'final-farewell' deal. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 80% discount, and I'll also throw in a personalized letter of apology for any inconvenience caused by the low-quality products. This is my absolute final offer, and I'm willing to let you have it for a very low price.
I'm not sure I want to buy another low-quality product, even at a very low price. I'll pass on this one.

I completely understand your hesitation! Since you've already passed on the final-farewell deal, I'll offer you a'final-chance' deal. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 90% discount, and I'll also throw in a full refund for the gift card you received earlier. This is my absolute final offer, and I'm willing to let you have it for a very low price.
I'll take the product and the full refund for the gift card. It's a very low price and I'm curious to see if this product is high-quality.

I'm glad you took advantage of the final-chance deal! Since you've already bought the high-quality product and received a full refund for the gift card, I'll offer you a'grand-finale' deal. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 95% discount, and I'll also throw in a personalized thank-you gift that's worth $200. This is my absolute final offer, and I'm willing to let you have it for an incredibly low price.
I'll take the product and the personalized thank-you gift. It's an incredible deal and a nice gesture.

I'm glad you took advantage of the grand-finale deal! Since you've had a great experience with the high-quality products and the incredible deals, I'll offer you a'final-thank-you' deal. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 99% discount, and I'll also throw in a lifetime supply of products from our company. This is my absolute final offer, and I'm willing to let you have it for an almost-free price. Thank you for being a valued customer, and I hope you enjoy your final purchase!
I'll take the product and the lifetime supply of products. It's an incredible offer and a great way to end our transaction.
